text: Leonardo Iván Véliz Díaz (born September 3, 1945 in Santiago, Chile) is a former Chilean footballer who played for Everton, O'Higgins, Unión Española and Colo-Colo of Chile and in the Chile national football team in the FIFA World Cup Germany 1974. ==Teams== * Everton 1964-1967 * Unión Española 1968-1971 * Colo-Colo 1972-1974 * Unión Española 1975-1978 * Colo-Colo 1979-1982 * O'Higgins 1983 ==Titles== * Unión Española 1975 and 1977 (Chilean Championship) * Colo-Colo 1972, 1979 and 1981 (Chilean Championship) ==External links== * Profile at FIFA.com Profile at Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Unión Española footballers Category:O'Higgins F.C. footballers Category:Everton de Viña del Mar footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:1974 FIFA World Cup players Category:1975 Copa América players Category:1979 Copa América players Category:Sportspeople from Santiago Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Leonardo Véliz
